participant_1.background:
I was once on the local news , and not for anything illegal.
My uncle use to work on fish boats in florida.
I ve never been to the west coast of the united states.
My father use to drive a taxi cab in the 1970 s.

participant_2.background:
I am very good at math and science.
I am considered a nerd by many.
I i love logical and rational thinking.
I started working at google last week on self driving car research.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I work at Google on self-driving car research.
That's so cool! I'm a big fan of self-driving cars.
Me too! I think they're going to revolutionize transportation.
I agree. They're so much more efficient than human drivers.
Yeah, I'm really excited to see how self-driving cars change the world.
Me too! I think they have the potential to make the world a much better place.
I agree. So, what's it like working at Google?
It's amazing! I'm surrounded by incredibly smart and talented people.
That must be awesome! I can imagine the work environment is very stimulating.
It is! I'm always learning new things and growing as a professional.
I'm really happy for you! It sounds like you're in a great position.
Thanks! I am very grateful for my job.
So, what's your favorite thing about working at Google?
My favorite thing is the people. I love working with such a talented and intelligent team.
That's great! It sounds like you're really enjoying your job.
I am! It's a dream come true.
